item.description:
It's a Christmas Party Meetup! Come one, come all! This year we will be at Jose McIntyreâ€™s on the 2nd floor. This event is free.

... - - - ... - - - ... - - - ... - - - ... - - - ... - - - ...

* Want to vent about Obama or Deval Patrick, or talk politics with someone who may actually share your viewpoint?

* Don't really care much about politics, but just looking to hang out with local conservatives or libertarians?

The monthly meetup is a casual gathering to give us lonely MA Republicans an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees, men and women of all ages!

Come whenever you can for a drink or dinner, or simply for the conversation. As always, there's NO AGENDA, so feel free to talk politics, current events, jobs, sports, vacation plans, movies...

* * * * * * * * * *

Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 15-30 attendees every time!

This event is also posted on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/events/175563329251605/
item.name: Republican Christmas Party Meetup
